column4: I'm trying to install ubuntu 8.04 on a pre-partitioned machine, I'm using the ICH-R chipset's onboard RAID for a RAID-5 between four disks....does anybody here know how I can work around this and install to this RAID array?
the issue is the same on 7 =\  I just decided to be more specific.. do you know how to get it running on 7?
there are people in the other channel best to go there ;]
